name: Vegan Arroz con Leche
description: Vegan Arroz con Leche, a traditional Mexican classic made dairy-free with soy milk, cinnamon. and raisins.

video.name: Vegan Arroz con Leche
video.description: Creamy, delicious vegan arroz con leche.

recipeIngredient: ½ - 1 cup Sugar or your sweetener of choice

recipeInstructions.text: In a large pot combine water, cinnamon stick, and rice. Bring water to a simmer and simmer slowly for 15 min.
recipeInstructions.name: In a large pot combine water, cinnamon stick, and rice. Bring water to a simmer and simmer slowly for 15 min.

recipeInstructions.text: Add soy milk to the pot and simmer for 10 more minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Add soy milk to the pot and simmer for 10 more minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Add ½ - 1 cup of the sugar (depending on desired sweetness), and simmer for another 10 minutes or until the arroz con leche has reached the right consistency.
recipeInstructions.name: Add ½ - 1 cup of the sugar (depending on desired sweetness), and simmer for another 10 minutes or until the arroz con leche has reached the right consistency.

recipeInstructions.text: Remove from the heat, add raisins, and let the rice cool slightly. It will thicken as it cools.
recipeInstructions.name: Remove from the heat, add raisins, and let the rice cool slightly. It will thicken as it cools.

recipeInstructions.text: Sprinkle with ground cinnamon before serving. Serve warm, or let cool in the refrigerator and serve cold.
recipeInstructions.name: Sprinkle with ground cinnamon before serving. Serve warm, or let cool in the refrigerator and serve cold.
